heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast, and in the Adirondacks and southern Greens. Chance of a sprinkle or flurry, mainly south. Near-steady temperatures, from the upper 30s to mid 40s north, and mid to upper 40s in the south. Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph in the north, and to 35 mph in the south.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly to partly cloudy northeast; otherwise mainly clear or becoming so. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s, around 30 near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light, variable to west, except becoming southwest 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Friday
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of sprinkles, then a rising chance of showers mid to late afternoon, mainly north. Highs in the low to mid 40s, except mid 40s to around 50 in far southern valleys, and in the Champlain and Hudson valleys. South to southeast 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
